SENT.plain: The Klippel-Trenaunay syndrome is a rare disorder in which the congenital vascular anomalies can affect the urogenital tract
Several cases of hemorrhage from the urogenital system have been reported in children with this condition
We report an upper renal tract hemorrhage in an adult, which required nephrectomy
To our knowledge this condition has not been reported previously in an adult with the Klippel-Trenaunay syndrome
We discuss the condition, and its diagnosis, treatment and relevance to the urogenital tract
